name: bibi
description: Bibi | EPUB Reader on your website.

scripts.develop: bibi.plays --clean --weave development && webpack --progress --config-name development && bibi.plays --wove development
scripts.develop@wbck: bibi.plays --clean --weave development@wbck && webpack --progress --config-name development@wbck && bibi.plays --wove development@wbck
scripts.build: bibi.plays --clean --weave production && webpack --progress --config-name production && bibi.plays --wove production
scripts.build@wbck: bibi.plays --clean --weave production@wbck && webpack --progress --config-name production@wbck && bibi.plays --wove production@wbck
scripts.make:package: bibi.plays --clean tmp --weave package && webpack --progress --config-name package && bibi.plays --archive
scripts.make:package@wbck: bibi.plays --clean tmp --weave package@wbck && webpack --progress --config-name package@wbck && bibi.plays --archive wbck
scripts.demo: npm run build@wbck && npm run serve
